name: Flappy Tubers
description:
This game is like Flappy Bird. Except you aren't a flying and falling bird. You take control of your favorite YouTuber or Twitch streamer to fly through 2 brick walls.

Recently added features: An invincibility power up and the ability to change keybinds.

Current characters:

Markiplier - WarfstacheClassic Flappy BirdKaciedilla - Taco catSodaPoppin - Giraffe

You can buy the current version of this game for $1. For $5 you can get your name put on the loading sequence after the game is out of beta testing.

Please consider helping out DodgeCoding by supporting us on Patreon here: patreon.com/DodgeCoding . Even a $1 per month donation can help.

DodgeCoding website: https://dodgecoding.wixsite.com/home
